amendment.description: Amendment increases funding for the Justice Assistance Grants program by $25 million.
amendment.purpose: An amendment to increase funding (by offset) for Justice Assistance Grants by $25,000,000.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Reichert amendment (A003) Agreed to by voice vote.

action.text: House amendment offered/reported by : Amendment (A003) offered by Mr. Reichert.
Amendment agreed to Committee of the Whole
House amendment agreed to: On agreeing to the Reichert amendment (A003) Agreed to by voice vote.
